title: In search of innocence
brief_description: A questioning filmmaker from Quebec finds out how Vancouver’s poets and painters look at life and art. Among the people seen are sculptor Donald Jarvis, painters Jack Shadbolt, Joy Long and Margaret Peterson, and printmaker Sing Lim. (Award: Chicago)
